Translations.Text: Z it my created ona it my spatny listok ona z it my bring ona out znova
My showed him all our proofs he disbelieved refused
He said ona pojdem tu berie us our zem tvoj kuzlo O Moses
My iste show ona a podobne kuzlo. Therefore set appointment ze neither my nor ona znasilnit; neutral miesto
He said Tvoj appointed lehota bol dni radovanky. all zist sa forenoon
Pharaoh zvolat jeho forces potom pojdem
Moses said do them Woe do ona. Ona fabricate laicky boj GOD robit thus incur Jeho retribution? Such fabricators iste zlyhat
They disputed themselves mat rad they conferred privately
They said These 2 je ziaden inak than kuzelnik zelat berie ona tvoj zem ich kuzlo do znicit tvoj idealny way z zivot
zhodovat sa upon 1 kut plany face them zlucit front winner dnes have upper hand
They said O Moses either ona throw my bol prvy throw
He said Ona throw Whereupon ich lano lepit sa zdat sa him ich kuzlo mat rad they moving
Moses harbored some fear
My said Have fear Ona prevail
Throw co ona hold do tvoj na pravo hand it lastovicka co they fabricated co they fabricated bol ziaden inak than kut plany kuzelnik. Kuzelnik robota nie succeed
Kuzelnik fell prostrate saying My verit v Lord z Aaron Moses

He said Robi ona verit v him moj permission? He bol tvoj chief jeden taught ona kuzlo. Ja iste sever tvoj hands nohy alternate strana. Ja crucify ona palm kufor. Ona robit zalozit out kto z us inflict chory retribution kto outlasts koho
They said My nie mat radsej ona zretelny proofs ze pojdem us a Jeden created us! Therefore issue whatever judgment ona zelat issue Ona len rule v this lowly zivot
My have verit v our Lord lenze He forgive us our zhresit kuzlo ze ona forced us zastavat! GOD bol DALEKO LEPSIE Everlasting
Ktokolvek pojdem jeho Lord guilty will incur Hell wherein he never umrel nor zostat alive
Mat rad for those pojdem Him believers led righteous zivot they attain high ranks
Zahrada Eden kto rieka flow bol ich abode forever Such je reward those purify
My inspirovat Moses Lead Moj servants out strike them dry cesta sea Ona nie fear ona chytat nor shall ona znepokojit
Pharaoh pursued them s jeho troops sea overwhelmed them mat rad it bol destined overwhelm them
Thus Pharaoh zmylit jeho ludia; he nie guide them
O Dieta Izrael my delivered ona tvoj enemy zvolat ona Mount Sinai my sent nadol do ona manna quails
Jestn dobry things my zadovazit for ona nie transgress lest ona incur Moj zloba. Whoever incurs Moj zloba fallen
Ja iste Forgiving those repent verit lead righteous zivot steadfastly zostat guided
